arts.ttl: Steven Pressley in searingly honest take as Dundee boss points finger at who’s to blame for Aberdeen annihilation
arts.sum: The Dark Blues boss spoke out after his side were hammered 4-0 at Pittodrie for Aberdeen’s first league win of the season
Steve Davies has picked out a correct-score prediction for each of the six games in the Scottish Premiership this weekend, and it still might not be good news for Rangers.
